content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='I-D.zzp-pim-rfc4601-update-survey-report'> <front> <title>Survey Report on PIM-SM Implementations and Deployments</title>  <author initials='L' surname='Zheng' fullname='Lianshu Zheng'>     <organization /> </author>  <author initials='J' surname='Zhang' fullname='Jeffrey Zhang'>     <organization /> </author>  <author initials='R' surname='Parekh' fullname='Rishabh Parekh'>     <organization /> </author>  <date month='April' day='5' year='2013' />  <abstract><t>This document provides supporting documentation to advance the Protocol Independent Multicast - Sparse Mode (PIM-SM) protocol from IETF Proposed Standard to Internet Standard.</t></abstract>  </front>  <seriesInfo name='Internet-Draft' value='draft-zzp-pim-rfc4601-update-survey-report-01' /> <format type='TXT'         target='http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-zzp-pim-rfc4601-update-survey-report-01.txt' /> </reference>
